Trafalgar.text:
Wind
In southeast, variable 2 to 4, but easterly 5 or 6 near strait of gibraltar. In northwest, variable 2 to 4, becoming westerly or southwesterly 5 to 7, increasing gale 8 for a time in northwest.
Sea state
In southeast, mainly moderate. in northwest, moderate or rough.
Weather
In southeast, showers. In northwest, rain or showers.
Visibility
In southeast, good. In northwest, good, occasionally poor.
